Posts.Content: hello Thank you for replying. I was given the biopsy at an assessment clinic, not a hospital, and given the list of hospitals there.
Posts.Title: Selecting hospital

Posts.Content: Hi, I have just had a biopsy on a little lump, and have been sent home with a list of hospitals , some local, some specialised. I have no idea of what to do - the nearest or the more specialist? Any ideas of how to choose? Many thanks
Posts.Title: Selecting hospital
